in.title: Free Station Installation
in.text: We are ready to help you attract more visitors interested in charging their phones. Reach a vast audience!
arrTxt: Introduce a new service for your clients by placing the station in a prominent location and actively informing visitors about it.
Our service is visited by more than 10,000 people daily, who will definitely see your venue on the map. We can offer you the option to make the station free for your customers.

Payment, revenue, and expense statistics are available for monitoring in your personal account. Typically, the station pays for itself within six months. Additionally, there's an option to purchase the station, in which case we will share the profit.

s.title: What is powerbank rental?
s.text_1: <1>The user realized</1> that they urgently need to charge their device
s.text_2: <1>The user charges</1> their device using a <1>POWER BANK</1> and can move freely around the city.
s.text_3: <1>Return the POWER BANK</1> anywhere in the city where there's a return point.
s.text_4: <1>Returning the POWER BANK</1> allows the user to get their deposit back, minus the usage fee.

items.title: New and Promising Niche
items.text: User base grows by 10-20% monthly.

items.title: Master Franchise
items.text: Opportunity to buy a master franchise. Manage a city, region, or country!

items.title: Simple Management
items.text: Install the station in a busy place. One person can maintain up to 100 terminals.

items.title: Passive Income
items.text: Active phase lasts 1-3 weeks, control and analysis are done remotely via an app. Break-even point is in the 6th month.

items.title: No Expenses
items.text: All battflit terminals are installed rent-free, unlike vending machines.

items.title: Quick Launch
items.text: Equipment delivery takes less than a month, training only 2 weeks.

items.title: Legal Support
items.text: Help with business registration, financial project support, transparent contract.

items.title: Technical Support
items.text: Call center available 24/7 for any issues.

items.title: Warranty Certificate
items.text: If you don't reach break-even, we will buy back your terminals!

items.title: We Give You the Best
items.text: We share experience and contacts of network partners.

items.title: Income from Sharing Power Bank
items.text: User rents a power bank and pays per minute while charging their device.

items.title: Income from Advertising on Power Banks
items.text: Businesses need brand awareness, and with many users, we can place ads on power banks.

items.title: Income from Advertising on Screens
items.text: With stations that have ad screens, you can earn extra from advertisers.

partner.title: How to Become a Partner?
partner.card_text_1: Our team will guide you at every stage. You will learn the pros and cons and get all the necessary information to become part of a successful franchise network.
partner.card_text_2: We will draft a transparent contract, help you register a business, and consult on all legal and technical matters.
partner.card_text_3: Our high-quality equipment specifications can be found in our catalog.
partner.card_text_4: We provide complete business training. Our program covers key aspects from management and accounting to marketing and sales.
partner.card_text_5: Weâ€™ll consult on the best locations in your city for maximum revenue.
